content:
Craft an item of type: arrow
inventory=[{"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 61, "index": 29}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft an arrow I need to craft a stick first. The stick recipe requires placing two pieces of wood side-by-side, so I need to place the bamboo in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: arrow
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 61, "index": 29}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I need to place another piece of bamboo next to the one in slot 1. I can place it in slot 4 since that is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: arrow
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 61, "index": 29}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}]
thought: Now I have crafted a stick, so I can move it to my inventory (e.g., slot 11) and use it later when crafting the arrow.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: arrow
inventory=[{"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 61, "index": 29}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft an arrow, I need to place a flint, a stick, and a feather in the crafting table. The flint is in slot 20, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: arrow
inventory=[{"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 61, "index": 29}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}]
thought: The stick is in slot 11, so I will move it to slot 4, which is below the flint.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: arrow
inventory=[{"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 61, "index": 29}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}]
thought: The feather is in slot 16, so I will move it to slot 7, which is below the stick.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: arrow
inventory=[{"type": "arrow", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 10}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 62, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 61, "index": 29}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 38}]
thought: The arrow has been crafted, so I will move it to slot 11, which is empty.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
